Export(Model, String, String, Boolean, Boolean)

Export model to disk

Declaration
void Export(Model model, string outputFolder, string modelName, bool exportglTF = true, bool exportGLB = true)
Parameters
Type Name Description
AssetGenerator.Model model
System.String outputFolder
System.String modelName
System.Boolean exportglTF

If true then glTF file and all associated .bin will be exported.
System.Boolean exportGLB

If true then a single packed GLB file will be exported.
